articles.description: Russell Crowe remembered Christopher Plummer as a “good man” as Hollywood continued to pay tribute to The Sound Of Music star following his death aged 91.
articles.content: Canadian actor Plummer enjoyed a stellar career on stage and screen, with acclaimed turns in films including The Man Who Would Be King, Knives Out and Beginners, the 2010 comedy which made him the ol… [+4521 chars]

articles.author: Zoe Forsey
articles.title: Common word George, Charlotte and Louis' nanny is banned from saying in front of them - Mirror Online
articles.description: Kate Middleton and Prince William hired Norland Nanny Maria Borrallo to help look after Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis - and she's a vital part of the Cambridge family's small staff
articles.content: Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis have one of the best nannies in the country, Maria Borrallo, who is helping the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge raise the next generation of royals. … [+4026 chars]

articles.author: Claire Gregory, Backstage podcast co-host
articles.title: Backstage with Salma Hayek: 'People have created their own Bliss worlds as a coping mechanism' - Sky News
articles.description: Sky News' Backstage podcast catches up with Hollywood star Salma Hayek to talk about her new film Bliss, co-starring Owen Wilson.

articles.author: Justin Enriquez
articles.title: SAG-AFTRA president Gabrielle Carteris says Donald Trump resigned from guild to avoid punishment - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 60-year-old actress - who famously starred in 90s drama Beverly Hills, 90210 - spoke to TMZ on Friday to address the 74-year-old former US president's letter to her.
articles.content:
SAG-AFTRA president Gabrielle Carteris says that Donald Trump resigned from the Actors Guild to avoid punishment from the union, but he could still be expelled.
The 60-year-old actress - who famousl… [+11929 chars]

articles.title: An "Emily In Paris" Writer Issued A Public Apology To Michaela Coel For Her Golden Globes Snub - BuzzFeed
articles.description: "'That show,' I told everyone who would listen, 'deserves to win all the awards.'"
